root.name: RC Cars
root.description: OverviewRC Cars is a remote controlled car racing game where you have to race around tracks based on locations you wouldn't usually race in - like beaches - and there are obstacles littering the tracks.System RequirementsSystem RequirementsPentium II 400 MHz64MB RAM16 MB Direct3D 8.0- compatible 3D video acceleratorHDD (min 300 MB HD free space)Keyboard, mouse
